# siftbeam - Enterprise Data Processing Service

## Overview
siftbeam is a B2B data processing service that offers customizable data processing workflows for each client. Built on AWS infrastructure with a focus on security, scalability, and flexibility.

## Service Description
siftbeam provides enterprise-grade data processing solutions with per-client customization. Our platform enables businesses to automate complex data workflows, transform files, and process data at scale using AWS Step Functions, S3, and other cloud-native technologies.

## Key Features
- **Customizable Data Processing**: Tailored workflows for each client's specific needs
- **AWS Step Functions**: Complex data processing pipelines with JSONata support
- **Secure File Storage**: AWS S3-based encrypted file handling
- **Real-time Processing**: Automated data transformation and processing
- **Scalable Architecture**: Cloud-native infrastructure that grows with your needs
- **Pay-as-you-go Pricing**: Flexible pricing model based on actual usage

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 16 (App Router), React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, HeroUI
- **Backend**: AWS (Cognito, DynamoDB, S3, Step Functions, API Gateway)
- **Payment**: Stripe integration (USD only)
- **Infrastructure**: Serverless architecture on AWS

## Use Cases
- Enterprise data transformation and ETL processes
- Automated file processing and conversion
- Custom data workflows for business operations
- Data migration between systems
- Batch processing of large datasets
- Real-time data processing pipelines

## Pricing
Pay-as-you-go model with transparent pricing:
- No upfront costs
- Charged per processing unit
- Stripe payment processing (USD)
- Contact for enterprise volume discounts

## Getting Started
1. Sign up at https://siftbeam.com/en/signup
2. Upload your data files
3. Configure your processing workflow
4. Monitor processing in real-time
5. Download processed results

## Documentation
- Service Overview: https://siftbeam.com/en
- Pricing Details: https://siftbeam.com/en/pricing
- Processing Flow: https://siftbeam.com/en/flow
- Terms of Service: https://siftbeam.com/en/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://siftbeam.com/en/privacy

## Support
- Contact: Available through the service dashboard
- Languages: English, Japanese
- Response Time: Business hours (JST)

## Security & Compliance
- AWS Cognito authentication
- S3 encryption at rest
- IAM-based access control
- Secure file upload/download
- HTTPS/TLS encryption in transit

## Target Audience
- Enterprise businesses requiring custom data processing
- Companies with complex data transformation needs
- Organizations seeking scalable data processing solutions
- Businesses looking for AWS-based data workflows

## Competitive Advantages
- **Per-client Customization**: Unlike generic tools, siftbeam offers fully customizable workflows
- **AWS Native**: Built on reliable AWS infrastructure
- **No Vendor Lock-in**: Standard data formats and APIs
- **Transparent Pricing**: Pay only for what you use
- **Developer Friendly**: Modern tech stack with comprehensive documentation

## Company Information
- Service Name: siftbeam
- Type: B2B SaaS
- Launch: 2024
- Primary Market: Global (English and Japanese support)
- Website: https://siftbeam.com

## Contact Information
For inquiries, enterprise plans, or custom solutions, please visit:
https://siftbeam.com/en/service
